sentences.en: A careful reading disclosed deficiencies in definitions and unwarranted assumptions.
sentences.cn: 一经细读便可发现其在定义上的缺点和无根据的假设.

sentences.en: Any attempt to discuss the issue of human rights was rejected as an unwarranted interference in the country's internal affairs.
sentences.cn: 任何讨论人权问题的尝试都会被以无端干预该国内政为由加以拒绝。

sentences.en: He thought that the Army's arbitrary rejection of the people was unwarranted.
sentences.cn: 他认为陆军不分清红皂白把这些人关在门外未免不讲道理.

sentences.en: His action was unwarranted, picayune, and vindictive.
sentences.cn: 他的行为是非法的, 卑鄙的, 恶意的.

sentences.en: I felt quite amused at his unwarranted choler.
sentences.cn: 他的无名怒火使我觉得很有趣.

sentences.en: I think it is a totally unwarranted waste of public money.
sentences.cn: 我认为这是毫无正当理由地浪费公款.

sentences.en: I think she has no real ability , just an unwarranted reputation.
sentences.cn: 我看她也没什么真本事, 徒有其表罢了.

sentences.en: Jeff: I hope that it is an unwarranted anxiety.
sentences.cn: 杰夫: 但愿是杞人忧天.

sentences.en: Maybe it is just an unwarranted anxiety or groundless fear.
sentences.cn: 也许,这只是杞人忧天或者无根据的恐惧.

sentences.en: Much of the criticism was totally unwarranted.
sentences.cn: 这种批评基本上是毫无道理的。

sentences.en: People on the street, when approached , seemed to find my questions unwarranted.
sentences.cn: 与街上的人搭讪, 这些人觉得我的问题意思不大.

sentences.en: Sally , those were an unwarranted diatribe one more times t IT!
sentences.cn: 莎莉, 你讽刺她是无正当理由的.

sentences.en: Sir, this is an unwarranted invasion of my privacy!
sentences.cn: 先生, 这是对我的隐私的毫无根据的侵犯!

sentences.en: Standards will seem unnecessary high; rigor will seem unwarranted.
sentences.cn: 标准会显得没必要的高, 严格程度也会显得没道理.

sentences.en: Therefore, this argument is unwarranted without ruling out such possibility.
sentences.cn: 因此,在不排除这种可能性的情况下, 这种论证是站不住脚的.

trans.tran_cn: 没有根据的，无保证的，未经授权的，莫须有
trans.tran_en: done without good reason, and therefore annoying
